Posts.Content: Morning all. Was diagnosed with bc november 10th 2014. Had the chemo then a masectomy july 9th 2015 then radio.......found a lump 2 days ago. My breast nurse has got me appt for today so just sitting around in morrisons waiting for the time to go, 20 mins till my appt. Scared and very lonely....... Fingers crossed guys xx
Posts.Title: Is it back?
